title: The Shadow in the Corner of your Eye

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Inflict paranoia in a player at night, causing them to deal a powerful attack to anyone who visits them that night.
- Drive someone crazy at night, making them deal a powerful attack to themselves.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are not affected by the paranoid attacks.
- You will not appear as the killer when your victim's death information is made public, instead it will show, "(Player) was killed by (Paranoid player's role)" or "(Player) commited suicide."

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill anyone who stands in your way.

desc:
Post 5282
*Fear will make them work for you.*
